title: UK’s Starmer Threatens Musk’s X With Action Over Child Images

title: CHINA SXT PHARMACEUTICALS, INC. ANNOUNCES STRATEGIC AI INSIGHTS INITIATIVE TO OPTIMIZE TRADITIONAL CHINESE MEDICINE PORTFOLIO, ENHANCE MARKET ANALYSIS AND EXPLORE AI-SUPPORTED CLINIC DEPLOYMENT
description: TAIZHOU, China, Jan. 08, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- China SXT Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (NASDAQ: SXTC) ('China SXT' or the 'Company'), a specialty pharmaceutical company focusing on the research, development, manufacturing, marketing, and sales of Traditional Chinese Medicine Pieces ('TCMPs'), including Advanced TCMPs (Directly-Oral TCMP and After-Soaking-Oral TCMP), fine TCMPs, regular TCMPs, and TCM Homologous Supplements ('TCMHS'), today announced the launch of a Strategic Artificial Intelligence (AI) Insights Initiative. This initiative aims to integrate AI-driven analytics into the Company’s product portfolio planning and market intelligence processes, further strengthening its long-term strategy to evolve into a data-informed and innovation-driven modern TCM enterprise.
content: TAIZHOU, China, Jan. 08, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- China SXT Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (NASDAQ: SXTC) ("China SXT" or the "Company"), a specialty pharmaceutical company focusing on the research, development, manufacturing, marketing, and sales of Traditio... [4485 chars]

title: Alphabet Overtakes Apple, Becoming Second to Nvidia in Size
description: Alphabet Inc. has overtaken Apple Inc. to become the second-most valuable company by market capitalization, a reflection of how the Google parent has emerged as one of the most significant winners of artificial intelligence.
content:

title: AI marketing platform Nitro Commerce secures $5 million from Cornerstone Ventures, others
description: The startup uses artificial intelligence (AI) solutions to help consumer brands address challenges around customer acquisition, attribution, and engagement across online and offline channels. Nitro said it is targeting $10 million in annual recurring revenue (ARR) over the next six months.
